author: tomw
releaseNotes:
0.9.5 - tomw - Support for Turbo mode (command and attribute).
0.9.4 - jcox10 - Bugfixes for "off" thermostat mode.
0.9.3 - tcurtin + tomw - Add FanControl capability.  Command dropdown lists on device page now match actual supported settings.
0.9.2 - tomw - Fix for data format of attributes: supportedThermostatFanModes and supportedThermostatModes (press Configure on device page to finalize update)
0.9.1 - tomw - Add 'off' as a thermostatMode.  Some improvements to Fahrenheit setpoints (still in progress).
0.9.0 - tomw - Initial release.
